body.name: Newfs Floor Lamp for Living Room, Arc Floor Standing lamp with Linen lampshade, Modern Metal Tall Lamps Floor Reading Lamp - Heavy Base Living Room Lamps for Bedroom, Kids Room, Office (Black)
body.stockDetail: Only 2 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 【Modern & Stylish Floor Lamp】The combination of premium linen lampshade and black metal lamp pole highlights the charm of minimalism and modernity, seamlessly integrated into any room style and using situation. And the linen lampshade can helps diffuse the light to make soft on eyes and reduce eyestrain, provide you with a comfortable reading environment. Serving as an elegant decorative farmhouse floor lamp for your living room, office, and bedroom.

【Release Your Hand - Convenient Foot Switch 】Our living room lamps equipped with the convenient pedal switch and the power cord, which allow you to tap the lamp on/off with your foot and spare our hands to do something else, assuring convenience for your daily life. Both children and adults can turn on the bedroom lamp easily.

【Sturdy Construction & Space Saving】To ensure the safety and stability of this mid century modern lamp, we have utilized the heavy-duty base, which could prevent shaking and accidental tipping. Whether placed in the living room or kids room, it's very safe. With the dimensions of 62.4 ” by 9.84 ”, this black floor lamp's slender design can be effortlessly positioned in a reading corner, or next to a TV, offering a versatile lighting solution for small rooms without occupying more space.

【Easy to Assemble】Don't worry! The installtion steps are simple and easy to operate. We provide the detail manual, no extra tools required and can be easily installed by one person following detailed instructions. Screw the poles together and into the base, wrap the shade around the frame and velcro it on. Bulb power: Choose any standard E26 base bulb you like (Note: max 15W LED/max 60W Edison bulb). Bulb NOT included.

【Wonderful Gift Choice & Reliable Customer Services】 Simple operation and elegant design of this standing floor lamp is a good choice as the gift for house warming, wedding, birthday or any holiday. If you have any dissatisfaction or questions after receiving the package, please feel free to contact us, and we will reply to you within 12 hours. We are committed to providing reliable service and premium products to our customers at always!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a pretty lamp with a nice natural feel. My living room is full of plants and nature decor so it blends in very well. It was a breeze to assemble and the floor switch is very convenient. I can walk into the dark room with my hands full and turn the light on without effort. When it is on the shade casts a patterned shadow across the wall. It lights up the whole room but it also makes a perfect project or reading lamp. The holes in the shade make sure the light reaches everywhere in the room but has enough rattan so it isn't as harsh as a bare bulb.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very heavy base and great fit & finish
reviews.reviewText: This floor lamp from Newfs is really a solidly built lamp and a very nice size. It has a durable black/ bronze finish…durable as I knocked it against the cabinet when I was assembling it and didn’t do any damage to the lamp. Also as I was almost finished tightening the post, I swung it around and hit myself in the head with the arc…so caution is advised…I guess I was just having a clumsy day. The floor lamp is 60” tall to the top of the round ball and 62” at its tallest. The shade is 12 1/2” wide and really neat how it is woven.It is made for a single wattage bulb ( so it isn’t a 3 way bulb - and 3 way bulbs are kind a thing of the past since we have moved to LED technology. ) The lamp has a push button built into the cord that sits on the floor so you can turn the lamp on and off with your foot.I really like the look of this Boho inspired floor lamp. It’s just the right height to swing around over your shoulder if you need to read or look at something up close. It has that current contemporary twist.The only thing that kind of surprised me was that the cord comes out above the base by about 2” ….I hadn’t seen this before but I think it makes it much easier to assemble. Also in assembling lamps, the plastic that covers the individual metal rods is tear away so you don’t have to cut it or anything, just grab and pull and it will split open as you pull.I did use a pair of channel lock pliers to tighten the base of the lamp onto the post. When it got to a modest tightness, the nut under the base just spun, to I held the channel lock pliers on the nut and rotated the post. I was cautious not to over-tighten for risk of stripping the metal insert but wanted to get everything nice and solid.I did do one ooopsy…I thought the shade might be slightly tilted so I pushed on the shade to try to adjust and it cracked the nut that screws on to hold the shade on the lamp. Some super glue and allowing the plastic nut to cure ( so it wouldn’t become permanently attached to the socket.) and I was back in business. If you think yours needs any adjustment, do so without the shade installed so that this doesn’t happen to you. I am very glad I chose this floor lamp from Newfs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I really like it
reviews.reviewText: I was worried about the condition this lamp would arrive in because of all the negative reviews, but mine was delivered perfectly fine all the way to Trinidad and Tobago. It was incredibly easy to set up and looks exactly like the photos. It’s sturdy with a heavy base. Not sure if my eyes are playing tricks on me but I think the pole is slightly leaning, so that’s why I could give a complete 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Reading Lamp
reviews.reviewText: Very nice bohemian rattan lamp that complemented another rattan lamp that we already had in the room. The matte black metal and rattan are simple and stylish and can fit in with a variety of decorating styles.The lamp is solidly made and is heavy enough that it is very stable on the base. It was also very easy to put together (should be 10 minutes or less) and didn’t require any additional tools.The design of the rattan shade allows for good light dispersion, and the lamp could be used as a primary light source for a bedroom or mid-sized living room using a larger LED bulb (15W/1600 lumens). We use it primarily as reading lamp (perfect for this) and a complementary lamp (1 of 3) for a larger living room so smaller bulbs (9W/800 lumens) provide a nice balance of ambient light for the room and directed light for reading.We are very pleased with the floor lamp and would highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So this is the second floor lamp I've ordered off Amazon, and I'm disappointed with this one as well. I ordered a very similar lamp a couple weeks ago and this lamp has the same exact problem. I suspect they are made in the same factory. Like the other lamp I ordered this one leans to one side... a lot (see pics). I had to physically bend the pole/tubing on that one so it would stand semi-straight, I'll have to do the same to this one. Shipping was fast, assembly was easy, but I cannot recommend this lamp for the price. I understand they're inexpensive, but I don't think it's unreasonable to expect a floor lamp to stand straight no matter how much you pay for it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Design is nice, but adjusting the brightness is not
reviews.reviewText: The metal frame of this lamp is decently constructed. Simple twist on assembly, and the rod-iron like metal is very sturday. The shade this lamp comes with isn't great. It's got some fraying that is very easy to see at the top and bottom of the frame. Little hairs of the linen stick out. Doesn't look clean. The most frustrating part is how to adjust the brightness. It does 3 brightness settings, but you have to turn it off between each setting. 1 click for bright, then next click is off, then next click is medium, then next click is off, the next click is warm. So from turning it on to warm, i have to click 5 times. If you do get this lamp, I highly recommend getting a smart bulb and be done with it. I would never want to use the button that it comes with. I still give it 3 stars because the frame looks great, and it'll be functional with a smart bulb...but I'm closer to 2.5 stars because of the hairy shade and poor power button.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Chic, Stylish and Sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Very attractive lamp that gets your attention when you see it a room. It casts such a pretty and relaxing silhouette when turned on. It was easy to put together and more stable than the other lamps I have. The lamp’s pole and base are smooth and of great quality. Love the foot control, I feel it’s easier than fumbling for a tiny swich especially for seniors. I’m having a hard time deciding where to finally place it because it goes great with any corner I tried putting it. I think it would also make an excellent gift.
